name: Healthyfied Mango Veggie wrap
description: This Healthyfied Mango Veggie Wrap combines the sweetness of mango with fresh vegetables and a hint of Parmesan cheese, all wrapped in a soft tortilla. Perfect for those who love healthy recipes with a high-sodium twist.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the cucumber under cold water, then slice into thin pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the lettuce into bite-size pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the mango into small, bite-size pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Lay the tortilla wrap flat on a clean surface.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Spread the labneh over the tortilla.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange the lettuce, cucumber slices, mango pieces, and red onion on the tortilla.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the grated Parmesan cheese over the vegetables.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Carefully roll up the tortilla tightly to enclose the filling.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the wrap in half diagonally and serve immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 10
